website_summaries.verdict: A modern twist to any entry way or family room. Does double duty as a bench or ottoman.
pros: Extra padding on top makes the bench comfortable to sit on for extended periods of time
cons: Top doesn't remain attached to the bench when open

customer_reviews.title: Great bench and awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made bench. Very sturdy if you follow simple instructions. Great quality. Awesome deal. I have been looking for a tufted bench to match my bed and this comes super close. You will not find a better deal on a bench of this quality. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen

customer_reviews.title: Flame retardant added, hence, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking piece of storage bench but as soon as i opened it, it says flame retardant added on the inside of the box. I couldn’t risk those toxic chemicals as I have kids and for myself as well. I also called Seville to see if they have the option of getting something without the flame retardant, which they don’t have. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: NamelessinJersey

customer_reviews.title: shoe storage solution
customer_reviews.text: I have limited closet/floor space, and shoe storage has always been an issue. I ordered this to place at the end of the bed as shoe storage after seeing an idea on Pinterest. (The bench with built in shoe slots was out of my price range.) I am very impressed with this bench! For a reasonable price, I got a sturdy, attractive bench that holds most of my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MPaige

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed to see the quality at such a low price. My 3 year old can't leave it alone and keeps telling me how soft it is. It has enough room to hide his toys from living room and it looks nice also. I would highly recommend anyone who is looking for sturdy storage bench for affordable price. Thanks for the reviewers who replied to my doubts. I am glad I bought this one and not the other. I have no problem of odor.
customer_reviews.author: SJVV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: update on my review, I've had this for a couple months now and it is not holding up very well at all and I use it just to store my daughters play dresses in :/
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to hold 500 lb don't make me laugh
customer_reviews.text: I just received this this morning I put it together this afternoon takes approximately 30 seconds I put a bunch of shoes inside of it and with their boxes to keep it more sturdy because it will rock back and forth and bust I put the lid on top made sure it was secure all the way around sat in the middle of it was perfect moved to one side to see if there was space for my boyfriend to sit next to me it's supposed to hold 500 I barely weigh anything in the lid broke. While it is cute and held a lot of shoes I wouldn't recommend buying it I hope I can return it
customer_reviews.author: Nina273

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are true...
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is FANTASTIC. Everyone who sees it asks where I got it from and say that they want one. Assembly was super easy. It took me less than 5 minutes to assemble. The color is great...nice and dark. It's sturdy and has ample storage. I keep 2 blankets, and extra set of couch pillows, and some picture frames in there and there's still plenty of room to spare. I've been trying to leave my open to air out as it does have a "new/factory" odor. Nothing overwhelming but I just don't want my blankets to get that smell. Great buy though! I'm purchasing the shoe ottoman next!
customer_reviews.author: PayJo38

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited about this
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this, it arrived, not so excited...the lid seems to be good quality but it did not come with the large panel, so the sides are caving in. Disappointed, but I'll use it for the kids toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Charcoal gray" is very dark
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm quite pleased with this product for the cost. I bought it to store more of my kids' toys in the living room, because I wanted something that looked nice, and could also double as additional seating (whenever it's safe to have people over again...). But I wish the "charcoal gray" color were not so dark, that's my one nitpick. In pictures it's more of a medium gray, which I really liked. It's closer to black in real life.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan H

customer_reviews.title: PEASE remove the the buttons for small children!!!
customer_reviews.text: Although this storage box is a perfect for my 1 year old grandaughters toys. HOWEVER! strongly suggest removing buttons as they are a serious choking hazard. I notice my little one pulling at the buttons so I started to cut them off. The buttons appear to be a daisy chain. As I cut one off the other buttons came loose. It is a sturdy storage box and foot stool.After the furst onefoot stool.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the sturdiness but this truly is very hardy. It can take all 140lbs of my weight when I stand on top. Works great as a seat as well. The top is very firm and sturdy. Lots of storage space for important documents. I don't move it around much so I would not recommend moving them around with heavy books and papers but for lightweight stuff like bed linen and soft toys it is relatively portable. Very easy and straightforward to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as some reviewers mentioned
customer_reviews.text: We bought the rectangle model. I understand that a square one will support more weight but I have my doubts that the rectangle one will hold 500lbs. I weight just under 200 pounds and it wobbles. Sitting down on it and not moving I don't notice it as much but if leaning over to put on shoes I feel some movement. In this type of situation I worry more about a break causing it to fold and snap as opposed to a collapse.
customer_reviews.author: B. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: We bought 3 of these!!
customer_reviews.text: We liked the first one so much, we bought 3! They are so easy to assemble and tear down. We have one in the RV and one in each bedroom for storage and to sit on to put on shoes, etc. The only thing is to allow them to air out for a little while, they have a slight chemical smell, but they are great!
customer_reviews.author: NCJeepDude

customer_reviews.title: Easy and perfect for storage and flexible seating in a classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to create a corner seating area in my classroom. It was SO easy to put together that I was actually nervous about it being sturdy enough. But my biggest of third graders as well as myself, have put it to the test and so far, so good. It also doubles as a storage box which is great as well. It's very light and easy to maneuver if needed and can be put side by side to create a square-ish ottoman. Glad I found these and my students are glad I did, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great service!
customer_reviews.text: Just What I was looking for as far as size, looks, and capacity. It says the weight limit is 500lbs. and I'm sure it is if spread out evenly. I sat on it while it was on an uneven surface and the top broke. The way it's constructed, it needs to be flat. That's obvious but I needed it for something outside. I will say, I emailed the company, told them the top broke and even though it was my fault, they sent a new top right away. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bell

customer_reviews.title: Best storage ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I bought this storage box/chest earlier. I have toys everywhere!!!! I miss having an organized family room. So when my son goes to bed everything goes back into the box. Its so nice to have it all nice and neat. The box literally took seconds to put together. The great thing is that the box is collaspable so if you decide to store it away, very easy to fold and put away. Its super sturdy to sit on. I was not expecting that. Great buy on Amazon. I don't think I could have bought this for such a great price elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JULIET R

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I literally built this like 5 mins ago and I couldn’t wait to hop on and write a review on this. I feel like this bench is such a steal! I feel like benches like these normally run on the more expensive side but this one i think is fair enough for the price. It’s so sturdy like I was amazed that I could sit on it (currently sitting on it as I write this review). I already sent pics to 2 friends. It’s a great bench for more storage and then bin is such a great add on for little things you don’t want to get lost in the bench. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vina

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, I didn't Expect Much..
customer_reviews.text: I am a blanket fanatic, I collect them like most woman collect purses or shoes. I had a pile starting to form in the corner of my room and was just looking for something small and compact to store them in (my bedroom isn't the biggest) I came across this and for the price as well as the positive comments I couldn't resist. It was VERY easy to setup. No tools required. I was pretty impressed with how sturdy it was since its basically a pop up bin. Currently, I have all four standard blankets in there plus a fleece queen size blanket. Its great! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: amandah0gan

customer_reviews.title: Chic storage option on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how well made this storage ottoman was. I have a small nook in my bedroom and I needed somewhere to put extra bed sheets abd some blankets and this was perfect! Its very well made even though it comes all folded up. All you have to do is open it up and put the top on! I haven't had issues with it bending on its own back to a folded up state. Fits perfectly in a small space but has tremendous amount of storage capacity. And its a beautiful dark gray/charcoal color that fits perfectly with the vibe of my bedroom. Very happy with this purchase! (Will upload photos wben space is complete)
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Matos

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly impressed. This is a brilliant product and an absolute bargain for the price. Mind you, this is not a luxury, leather clad, memory foam wrapped, nickel hardware appointed ottoman (why would an ottoman need nickel hardware???). Anyway, what it is, is rock solid, well upholstered, and rather attractive ottoman, with the added bonus of a bunch of extra storage space. It's easily moved, supports two adults if the extra seating is needed, and collapses down to an incredibly efficient size for long distance moves or if you just need it out of the way for a while. I'd buy this ten times over.
customer_reviews.author: Bob. Oh, Bob.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I figured this was too good to be true given the price and the simplicity of the construction, but so far (one month) this has been great and has held up whenever I sit on it to tie my shoes. Amazingly sturdy given the fact that it's essentially a pop-up design, the sides are held in place by a thin sheet of plastic and reinforced by whatever you store in it. Lid is rock solid, in fact you definitely do not want to drop it on your big toe.
customer_reviews.author: next

customer_reviews.title: Your things will smell
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a while now and even thought it is very easy to set up and can hold a lot, the smell hasn’t gone away! You can’t smell it when you’re next to it, but anything you put on top of the seat will smell like salted fish. I tried washing and scrubbing it with soap and leaving it to dry outside, but the smell is still there. I do love it and how much it can hold, but I wish it didn’t leave a smell on everything I put on top or in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Using as sturdy toy bin
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product. I'm glad I read reviews for the "cute" toy bins and decided to go with this ottoman instead for toy storage. Comes collapsed, but very easy to assemble. The color says charcoal gray, but it seems very dark. Closer to black. My place has a lot of espresso wood and chocolate brown so I would've preferred a different color, but I just set this off to the side so it's not the centerpiece of the room. Would have given it 5 stars, but it has a funky odor that I'm hoping will go away with time.
customer_reviews.author: cmrs25

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bench
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my little sister who is going to college. It's the perfect present for a dorm room. She can store stuff inside and put her stuffed animals on top of it. This thinf is very sturdy once put together. I also love how it folds together very small so it was great when having limited car space. I definitely recommend this to college students!
customer_reviews.author: Caterpillar City

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I pictured but very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday, so I can't speak to the product's longevity. But I can honestly say I'm impressed by its quality. I can sit on this without fearing for my life. It was a little smaller than I pictured but that's my own fault. (Boston Terrier for size reference). The dimensions listed are accurate. We're using this as a toy box for our 6 month old. I wanted something that wasn't juvenile and blended in with our decor. There's plenty of room now but I would imagine we'll need to upgrade to something a bit bigger in the future. But then, we can use this to store blankets or something.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Matiya

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little disappointed with this bench because it doesn't feel very solid
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed with this bench because it doesn't feel very solid. When I sit on it and rock back and forth the whole thing sort of shifts around. Sitting on it for more than a few minutes makes my but go numb. And it has a very foul plastic-ey smell inside that won't seem to go away. I'm afraid to store any fabrics and the like inside of it lest they end up smelling funny too.
customer_reviews.author: a4nandez

customer_reviews.title: Expecting flimsy- got sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than you think and heavy duty too, you might say. Would hold 2 people sitting on it but really room for one adult. So easy to “assemble.” Up in 30 secs. Doesn’t come with an inner divider for stability, which was unclear, but doesn’t need it really. If you’re considering it just get it. Lives up to expectations. Little tray is nice too. Versatile, dark charcoal color. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: DangerGoose

customer_reviews.title: Great for toy storage!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We have been using this for living room toy storage for a few weeks. It's held together better than I thought it might. Popped together in 5 seconds super easily. I love it! I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarha Hall

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Takes literally 7seconds to assemble. Me and my sister sat on it combined weight of about 375 and we didn’t feel like it was going to collapse under us! Looks very nice, the fabric is a little sturdier which I appreciate. Only thing I would change is the little remote easy access compartment, it stays on with heavy duty velcro which is good and it stays but would be nice is it was just a hook on each side so you can slide it instead of that loud (makes Velcro noise with mouth) at 4am lol. Overall great product would recommend would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lani G

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: It is fine. It is basically a giant canvas box but it actually holds my gross, misshappen body like a freaking champ so five stars for that alone. The material is also pretty and sturdy. It holds two comforters, a few sheets, and some pillowcases nicely. Much more than that and it may bulge in the sides and be difficult to close.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble, nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail today. Surprised by how super simple it was to put together!! No screws or anything. Just unfolding. Seems sturdy so far. My 3 year old has be laying on it. Nice size for what I need it for. Considering buying another for other rooms. As a side note it does have a weird smell to it out of the box. Not bad, not good...:just a new in box sort of smell that has filled the room that I’m not a fan of.
customer_reviews.author: LisaAG

customer_reviews.title: Smells like fresh paint!
customer_reviews.text: The storage bin is really nice and easy to set up. Great for the price! But it smells like fresh paint! I have left it open hoping the smell will go away soon but it's been two days now and it has not even gone away, even a little. I am using the bin for my child toybox and I'm a little afraid to put the toys in it. Has anyone else had this problem?
customer_reviews.author: MDinTraining

customer_reviews.title: Great as toy boxes
customer_reviews.text: We got 1 as a toy box in the living room, then liked it so much we bought a second one to wrangle more clutter. I was surprised at how they do support adult weight.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than it looks
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too sure about how sturdy this would be and if it would hold up to a rambunctious 8 year old and friends. After catching one of them jumping on it. It is still holding strong. Held more than I thought. Not a fan of the little tray because it mounts to the sides with velcro, but it's okay because it sits on top of items in the box. Looks great in my living room and tied all the games away.
customer_reviews.author: ucbear9600

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this too give my aging dog an easier way to get into my bed. Poor guy is going on 13yrs and has a bit of arthritis...he was curious at first didn't want anything to do with it....a couple days later...he noticed the cat chilling on it and started using it...mission accomplished! Added bonus is I can store items in it...and when company comes...it becomes an extra seat.
customer_reviews.author: NeeRu

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much!
customer_reviews.text: Ignore our awful wall in need of repair, but I love it so much, even my handyman skeptical husband was impressed. Took me approx 5 minutes to put together and that was mostly opening the box. My toddler loves laying on it and it should store all her pretend play toys she's getting for Christmas. Probably going to get a bigger one for the foot of our bed to store blankets in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for apartment living! these fold down to basically nothing for easy transport but they can hold so much stuff and look like a real piece of furniature when you put it together. it goes together in all of one minute, no instructions needed. It comes with a small box insert that can be attached by velcro anywhere to the inside rim of the automan itself. It also holds a decent amount of weight, my 3 year old niece loves to use it as a mini-couch when she watches movies with me! Such a great product for such a great price, can’t say enough!
customer_reviews.author: Anika

customer_reviews.title: Loved this and thinking how many more to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I'm looking forward to getting more. It's super easy to set up and sturdy enough that my 5 yr old son can jump off it to his hearts content. What set this version above the others, for me, was the smaller bin that attaches to the inside of the storage bench. There is plenty of space to put toys and board games, blankets, etc. I have to say, I enjoyed the footrest as well! Good looking product and very practical. Yes, please.
customer_reviews.author: RTurn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product has 5 stars for a reason. This company is realizing that their product is so good, that they can raise the prices and still get people to buy it. I bought this when it was 35$ just 2 weeks ago and it was and is the best thing ever. Now that it's 50, it's still great, but i am disappointed they raised the price. My only regret is that I didn't buy another one when I had the chance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much storage!
customer_reviews.text: This is super sturdy. I use it to put my home gym equipment inside. Which has weights and it’s amazing.... I love it!!!!! And I love the little compartment it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Jesygrl12

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, lots of storage, great price
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic and it's very easy to "put together". I say "put together" because there's really no assembly required - it shows up with 4 pieces: one bigger piece that folds open into the box shape, a rectangular piece that gets placed in the bottom for support, the lid, and a divider/compartment that just gets placed inside. Takes all of about 30 seconds from unboxing to have this thing ready to go. Pretty solid construction and the fabric is of a nice quality (especially for the price). My ladyfriend and I have both sat on it at once and had no concern it would break down. LOTS of storage space inside. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but effective
customer_reviews.text: Very slightly wobbly, but that is to be expected of a peice of furniture that is so simple and light. I have no fear of it breaking while I stand, sit, or jump on it. Just dont expect this ottoman to survive a trip down the stairs or flight from an upper story window. Perhaps that will be my next test 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Latta

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy and has a tremendous amount of storage space
customer_reviews.text: Despite its lower price point, this ottoman looks expensive and luxurious. It's very sturdy and has a tremendous amount of storage space. After losing my walk in closet, I use it to house out of season clothing. I imagine it would work well for throw pills or blankets. It was very easy to put together and is holding up well. Our extremely large sheltie uses it to jump on the bed, so it definitely can hold some weight! Extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Akea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a trunk to keep my sentimental items in which are currently in a brown moving box in my closet. I thought this would be a great alternative AND serve a dual purpose as a seat in my closet. I pulled it out that box and boom, that was the assembly. It's so pretty and such a nice quality. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Elleanor

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, sturdy storage.
customer_reviews.text: Still holding up 10.5 months later. We live in an old farmhouse, so storage is an issue in every part of the house. I bought these as a way to corral the kids toys in an attractive way. Comes with the added bonus of being plenty sturdy enough to sit on and is my go-to for changing light bulbs in their room. I seriously cannot believe how sturdy it is. I plan on picking up another one for our bedroom to store extra linens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic!!! Want 3 more!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap! Love this thing. Assembled in 10 seconds, super sturdy to sit on, huge for price, has a little basket with a lid inside for organization. I love how it literally folds down to nothing - would make moving it a breeze. Seriously considering buying another or three...
customer_reviews.author: bambi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this little storage bench. For the price it's great! I don't think it's meant for anyone heavy to be sitting on it but my husband and I have sat on it a few times with no issues but we are both pretty small or skinny. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much when I purchased this ottoman since the price was so great. I was blown away by how strong the ottoman. It can easily support me when I sit on it (125lbs). It's super spacious and can hold my queen size air mattress until I need to bring it out for my guests. The small compartment is also useful for holding small things that I don't necessary know where to place in my room. It's just a great ottoman, definitely a lot cheaper than the "cheapest" ottomans you buy in store. I feel like you're getting great quality for the price you're paying. I love how much it can hold.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS!
customer_reviews.text: The cons: I've been airing out this ottoman bench since I bought it for the last 3 weeks and the chemical odor smell is STRONG!! I am wondering if this has been sitting in a warehouse for too long, or the materials used to manufacture this was in a less-than-ideal environment. I air it out by a window and the smell is still lingering. The pros: Huge, spacious, lovely size for all my miscellaneous junk in the living room. The weight capacity so far is holding up very well, as I have sat on it (sometimes on just the lid by itself) and it has held up each time.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great storage and fancy look!
customer_reviews.text: The storage benches arrived very quickly and packaged perfectly. So easy to put together and no tools needed is an extra. Held all my daughter's books in one and toys in another. They are placed together - side by side, looking like a large square in the middle of her room. The comfy topping is a great seating area for her to play and / or watch T.V.. I have even sat on it with no problem at all. I am so very pleased with them - the ample storage and sturdiness are awesome for such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Moon Seeker

customer_reviews.title: But based on the reviews I decided to give it a try and I'm so glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I'm literally so shook by this little bench. As someone who is 200+ pounds I was nervous about purchasing a bench that was essentially a box. But based on the reviews I decided to give it a try and I'm so glad that I did. This thing is super sturdy and I haven't felt uneasy a single time. I haven't tried standing on it or anything but it works great in my entry to sit and put on shoes. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: We got the bench and its amazing!!! I'm definitely buying another one...maybe even 2!! We are using it as a toy box in our living room! It goes great with furniture and holds and hides everything without looking like a toy box!!! AND ITS ANOTHER SEAT AS WELL!! Exactly what we wanted! Great price! Definitely buying more! Lol my husband said we should buy a bunch and put them all along my son's wall like one long seat with storage!
customer_reviews.author: DNice

customer_reviews.title: Great product, so happy we got it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly sturdy build quality despite breaking down into basically the size of the top cover. When I received the box it was pretty hefty but was super thin, I didn't realize with the ottoman you would have to piece it together. Putting it together was a snap though, and easily done without minutes. The ottomon has a great feel too it, and as mentioned above is pretty damn sturdy. I'm 240lbs and can comfortably stand on it no problem. For the price, as long as you like the pattern, color, etc...I don't think you can go wrong. It's definitely a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Criticalhitkoala

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece.  So easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised and pleased with the quality of this storage bench. I usually struggle with assembling things but this was a snap...took all of 5 minutes!! Hardest part Was getting it out of the shipping box...really packed well. Was a bit leery of the fold out description but pleasantly surprised. You'd never know it was a fold out piece. Very sturdy...nice upholstery...bigger than expected. Love it. Just ordered another one. Get it...you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Loving this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my living room. The color is perfect for me. I'm going to order a second one for my bedroom. It's sturdy - I can use it to rest my feet on when I'm on my couch with no problem. And there's plenty of storage space in it.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty decent little ottoman for the price, it is very aesthetically pleasing but very thin when it comes to the box portion and the bottom is mostly just polyester lining with the exception of the cardboard piece you insert. it's honestly a good little storage piece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome storage bench
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small condo and don't have a lot of space. I was originally looking for a toy chest, but decided to order this bench instead. I love how it looks in my living room. My baby usually plays with his toys in the living room and then we just pick them up and put them inside the bench and everything looks nice and clean. Way better than buying a high bulky toy chest.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to have somewhere to sit by the door as I put my shoes on. And loved that it had storage to put my hand bag, keys, and umbrella in. The installation was super easy and its very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved and have a bit less closet space than I used to. I have been keeping old pictures and childhood mementos in a big plastic tub and it was driving me crazy. I bought this and was able to fit everything in it and get rid of that hideous tub! It is very sturdy and it looks great, like it's more for for seating than storage. I'm ordering another one right now for my bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Storage Solution!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product as a storage solution. We live in a one bedroom apartment in the city with limited space. I was looking for an additional place to put all my sweaters. This has worked perfectly. I was able to fit around 40 small cardigans within. Its also incredibley sturdy. I am able to sit on it to put my shoes on in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Maimone

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: What did I pay for this? Did they ship me a high end ottoman by accident? This piece is EASY to assemble (fool proof), heavy duty, GORGEOUS linen exterior and a huge interior space to hide your mess! It looks like a luxury piece of furniture you would pay $150-$300 for at any Raymour or Ethan Allen! Love this! Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: What a gem
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled on this ottoman by searching for a toy box. I also happened to need an ottoman. For the price it seemed too good to be true. After taking measurements and reading every review, I bought it. We popped it open, super easy to set up and surprisingly sturdy. Pretty comfortable to put your legs off. And it's standing up to the strength of a toddler daily, so we'll see how long it lasts. So far so good. My cousin was visiting when it arrived... she liked it so much she ordered one too! Probably the best purchase I've made on Amazon recently.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Use it in den to store blankets and it’s perfect! It’s neat looking and my kids can sit on it to put their shoes on. Took about 10 seconds to open it up and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Dimaggiofam

customer_reviews.title: Where's the inner box?
customer_reviews.text: I like the cost & ease - quality seems fine so far, but it must of been made & packed in China, cuz there was no small inner box to velcro to the side as advertised. So sick & tired of getting ripped off by China! I work hard for my money & and required to do my job correctly. Is it on purpose they rip people off or is it just one person being lazy?
customer_reviews.author: Peni L Osso

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: 20 pound cat for scale. Normal size cat would fit 2. Super sturdy, easy to put together, holds a lot! Way better than I expected for the price. And if the demons destroy it with their claws, I won't be sad!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Beltrame

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I'm using this in my bedroom to store sweaters, sweatshirts and other bulky clothing. It looks classy and is sturdy enough to sit on. I'm thinking of ordering a cube or two for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi in NC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I was looking for more storage that would double as seating, and this works well for that. Price point is great. It's easy to assemble (literally just unfold and place the accessories) but feels sturdy at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Chic and Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Who knew this could look so chic? I was surprised at the sturdiness of a foldable bench. I weigh around 230 lbs and it holds my weight. Currently using it as throw blanket storage and was a great option for a slim space in our bedroom that a chair would have felt bulky in.
customer_reviews.author: Team Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It’s classy looking and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: It really added a nice touch to my new bedroom set. Love it! Super easy to assemble, too! Loved the extra little storage crate included. My cat took it over immediately, loves it, too. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but I would not sit on it
customer_reviews.text: This pop-up storage bench is beautiful. I thought I read that it would withstand 500 lbs. What that means is it can contain up to 500 lbs but I am of normal weight and would not feel comfortable sitting on it because it's made from a sturdy cardboard under the fabric. As a coffee table or accent piece to hold things it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bracewell

customer_reviews.title: Great toybox
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great toy box for our kiddo. We wanted something that looked nice and easy to move around and this fit our needs perfectly. It’s fairly sturdy for our rambunctious toddler but would still be careful because I wouldn’t say it’s completely toddler proof. For the price that we got it(40-45$) it was cheaper than getting a clunky toybox
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, foldable storage ottoman, great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good, basic storage option for toys. I put all my 4yo toys in it that my 1yo can’t play with. My 4yo can get into it easily when he needs to. It’s sturdy enough to sit on. I did read in another review that the buttons on top are not secured very well. They were right. None of mine have fallen off or have been ripped off by children yet. They are very loose though so I won’t be surprised if it happens. Overall I’m really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: a_dream

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfy for an ottoman, and is actually study enough to sit on. Storage is good, I stuff a bed pillow, sheet and two blankets in it, no problem. And I LOVE the added little inside box. I use it for my ridiculous amount of remotes. Easy to assemble, would be again. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: chris nemec

customer_reviews.title: Not great but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Its a larger version of a foldable cloth bin. A little more sturdy but after having it for a couple weeks the material was already starting to wear down on the edges where you open the box. Also, i have a really hard time putting the lid back on. Almost like the box is slightly too big. But i use this for toys so it works well for that.
customer_reviews.author: danet cadwallader

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Fashionable, Huge space Saver
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I ordered 2 of these and they are amazing. We are refurnishing our room and need extra space oh wow we couldn't love them more. They can store a huge amount and are very fashionable. Infact we just ordered 2 more smaller cube shaped ones. Very excited for those to arrive to continue redecorating and saving space. Also they are very strong and will work as seaters like we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: khalifa

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy and nice to look at storage box. It is sitting in a guest room at the bottom of the bed and it is holding two queen sized duvets. I have sat on it several times but I wouldn’t shuffle around whilst seated on it though. Nice purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Love. Love
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love. Love. Very study and a flattering accent to the bedroom. I lay a throw over it and my dogs love to walk on it. I can even sit on it and it doesn't buckle or bend, to be honest could probably stand on this and it would be fine but I wouldn't recommend that. Would definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a discreet way to store extra stuff. You are getting so much more than what you are spending for this. I would buy more if I had the room.
customer_reviews.author: Nicollette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have it by my front door and use it as a shoes organizer. The only reason I didn’t give it five stars is because I wish the kid folded open instead you have to lift it off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy W

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing school book bags
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing book bags. I purchased this to put inside our closet that is right by the front door. I was tired of my kids throwing their book bags on the floor and having to walk over them. They now know they must put them inside this bench every day after school. It is great quality and you can sit on top of it to put on shoes or just to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but could do without the fire retardant chemicals...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this ottoman is really good quality. Lots of storage space and I love how it adds an extra seating option in my son's nursery (we're using it as a toybox). However, I'm not thrilled about the added fire retardant chemicals in the material. The label states that the item would pass for fire safety even without the added chemicals, so I'm not sure why they were added in the first place. I really wanted to get a second one for use in my living room to store our couch blankets, but I don't really want to take the risk of adding more chemicals into my house.
customer_reviews.author: mspj16

customer_reviews.title: Great storage!
customer_reviews.text: I bought to help store my child's toys so they weren't all over the living room and so glad we bought it. It helps keep the room neat and matches our furniture too, so after he grows up we can still use it to store other things like blankets and pillows. Also sturdy enough to sit on. Fast delivery and super easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this... Had to buy a few more after I realized how nice they were. We have one in the living room for shoes, one in the playroom for toys, one in the bedroom for extra blankets/pillows, and one in the office for all of my old nursing school books. They make a great extra seat! The cushion is nicer than I thought it would be too! Great buy if you need to get organized and hide the clutter!
customer_reviews.author: Gena R David

customer_reviews.title: good toy box
customer_reviews.text: Searching for an inexpensive toy box was tiring, so I thought I'd try this and if it didn't work out, I'd use it in another space. My 5 year old can open/close it and spends a lot of time using it as a sitting bench (he likes that it serves two purposes and apparently always wanted a bench?) Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal!! My daughter loves it and it fits perfectly at the end of a twin bed. The fabrics IV great. I was worried it would be flimsy but it seems sturdy. This is a 5 star deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Truth be told

customer_reviews.title: Great looking storage.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is great multi-purpose storage. It's a little smaller than I expected. I originally planned on using it for storing extra blankets and comforters, but instead use it in our living room to hold my son's toys. It looks great, pops up really quick and it very sturdy. I will probably purchase more for other storage needs.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I got the dark grey and it is pretty. I use it next to my window for blankets and other stuff and it looks great. Holds a lot of weight too! VERY STURDY when the lid is on correctly. It also looks more expensive than it is. I also love that I can fold it up if I move or don't need it for a while. SO HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: One of my most favorite products on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: One of my most favorite products on Amazon! I can’t tell how much I love this product! I use them as ottomans to sit on when I’m in my loft area but they also act as “toy boxes” for my grandchildren’s toys that they play with when they come to visit me! L O V E • T H E S E • My Husband and I purchased four, love them so much WE re-purchased four more!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very strong.
customer_reviews.text: It's really strong. This is the second one I have bought. The other one is a year old and still looks like new despite my son sitting, standing and jumping off it. We use one for his art supplies and one for some toys.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. I wanted a place to store kids' board games in my living room, without looking cheap. This actually looks and behaves like a piece of furniture!! Great quality, sturdy, durable, and unpackaged/unfolded in SECONDS! Need one for every room in the house. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: EJMommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for families with little kids!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman with storage!!! This is so sturdy, and takes literally about 5 seconds to put together. No tools needed other than your hands. I love the Velcro “drawer” on the inside. I use this to store my kids toys because their toys take over my entire living room when they are splayed out everywhere. Now I can have some peace and organization when I put my feet up to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Came in a thin box that was folded up and I had my doubts but it was super easy to put together and I'm Very impressed the quality of this bench. Generous space inside, and it looks great. I sat on it to test it out and it's super sturdy like other reviews said, and pretty comfy as the top is slightly padded. Will more than likely buy another for a different room on my home.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lankford

customer_reviews.title: love this storage bench
customer_reviews.text: This storage bench is great. It is even better quality than I expected. It is very durable and sturdy and exactly what I needed for my son's nursery. I wanted something that would server dual purpose. I wanted to be able to store his fluffy blankets and also be able to sit on it when necessary. It is so nice. It was easy to assemble and also has a nice look to it. I am definitely going to buy another one for my guest room to keep spare linens in. If you are looking for additional storage and seating, I highly recommend you consider this piece.
customer_reviews.author: ksn19

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. It was cheaper to order 2 of these than the single larger ones I was looking into and these 2 offered more space. I was able to fit 4 king size blankets, a king size comforter which is very thick, an extra shower curtain, extra bath mat and an extra set of king size sheets in these with room to spare in both. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: A lot sturdier than I thought it would be. So easy that the hardest part of setup was getting the darn box open! I’m getting more of these. Update: one word of advice, they’re definitely strong enough to sit on but..uh... don’t stand on it! Cracked the cover a bit but it still holds my stuff lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmifrag

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This was money well spent. I purchased it for my children to use in the living room as a seat while playing videos games. The piece is very sturdy and will most likely withstand countless hours of Minecraft and occasional wrestling matches. It's a bonus for me too. It has a nice area for storage inside and an unexpected (and moveable) hanging shelf. Very few items are as well thought out and constructed as this one. This storage seat is exactly what I needed to add additional seating in my small livingroom. I will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: As a full time RVer, this was perfect for shoe and misc storage and cleaned up my space! Now I dont have to dress up the YETI in order for my dog to get on the bed either! Perfect. Also, I'm a fat kid at 232lbs and I've stood on this for curiosity and it holds my weight without feeling like its about to crack. Great durability!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: More storage than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This was so affordable! I thought for the price it might not be so nice but we love it. We placed it in front of our couch to rest our feet on or eat in front of the TV. It holds our throw blankets and pillows while having an extra compartment that we place remotes and game controllers. Super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: It’s the best
customer_reviews.text: This bench is perfect size. I put it in my laundry room by the back door. It’s somewhere to sit and put shoes on. And to storage our dog and cat food. The color is a pretty charcoal gray. And the buttons on the top make it look fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Greathouse

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect this quality for this price. Very well made, sturdy with durable, good looking fabric covering. Looks great in living room. Light weight to move but strong enough to be used as an extra seat. Roomy storage area. (holds 2 extra large afghans). My sisters are both buying two. They had seen this online but didn't think it would look so nice and be so sturdy since it was foldable and inexpensive. It's nice to find a product that really is better than what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great functionality, great esthetic, great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% in love with this purchase... so much so, that I have now ordered 2 and will probably order more on the future for other rooms in my house. I crochet every so often, and I have a slight obsession with buying more and more yarn... with no where to put it. Now I do!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Welter

product_meta.title: Seville Classics 31.5" Foldable Tufted Storage Bench Footrest Toy Chest Coffee Table Ottoman, Single, Charcoal Gray
product_meta.description: Color:Charcoal Gray| Size:Twin| Style:Bench| Pattern Name:OttomanFurnish your home with Seville Classics' foldable tufted storage bench ottoman in modern gray. Remove the tufted cushion top to reveal a generous storage area for organizing clothes, blankets, linens, toys, remotes and more! Use the removable inner bin to organize small items inside The bench. Secure the bin along the length on the bench’s interior with fabric fastener handles. Doubles as a plush footrest in the living room and is ideal for use as a stool in communal work spaces, dorm halls, or commercial environments like lounges. Folding design means the bench sets up in seconds and takes up little space in storage. * 100% non-woven polyester in an elegant modern gray * Cushioned and tufted lid provides comfort and style * Removable inner bin for organizing smaller items * Solid MDF construction throughout with removable top easily unfolds for set-up; no tools required * Dimensions: 31. 5" W x 15. 7" D x 15. 7" H inner bin dimensions: 14. 8" W x 7. 1" D x 4. 1" H * Weight capacity: 500 lbs. on the lid (when closed); 50 lbs. for the interior bottom * Weight: 15. 7 lbs. * Model #: WEB284
feature_bullets: Included Components: 1 Base;1 Large Panel;1 Lid;1 Bin;1 Small Panel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,160 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
